name: Witch Craft (Amir1632)
description:
Bat wing, crow feather, lizard tail or wolf fang, collect all the necessary ingredients to concoct your magic potion. But watch the fire ! It must be neither too strong nor too weak for your elixir to be perfect!

Gameplay

  • Use your finger to move the cursed  hand and catch the ingredients.
  • Follow the receipe and catch the ingredients in the right order.
  • You can cancel a wrong ingredient by catching its opposite.
  • Watch the fire under your cauldron so that it is not too high or too low

Context: 

Participating together in the Ludum Dare, with the theme of the unstable, we, a team of 6 video game students from the Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia (IIM), work together to bring you this Witch Craft prototype.

Ludum Dare GameJam Theme :  Unstable

Plateform :  Mobile - local

Genre : Single player - Arcade - Crafting

Art : Minimalist 2D

Team

Amir Alotounou - Game Designer

Adrien Ribeiro – Game Developer 

Florian Ribeiro – Game Developer  

Julien Sadarnac - Game Developer  

Mathieu Prevot - Game Developer  

Pauline Roy - Game Artist
